title: How to make a movie without a camera
creator_credit: Rainy Day Productions, Michael Warshaw and Mimi Warshaw
brief_description: Presents the results of efforts made to produce a film without a camera, using the following techniques to produce striking effects: vegetable dye colouring, felt-tipped pen, sprays and fingerprints all individually applied to clear leader; and scratching and perforating of opaque leader. The film is especially useful to young filmmakers.
